locale.name: zh_CN
locale.message: 文章 &刊期XML插件
导入与导出文章与刊期

使用方法: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} [command] ... Commands: import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] articles [articleId1] [articleId2] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] article [articleId] export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issues [issueId1] [issueId2] ... export [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issue [issueId]
Additional parameters are required for importing data as follows, depending on the root node of the XML document.
If the root node is <article> or <articles>, additional parameters are required. The following formats are accepted:
{$scriptName} {$pluginName} import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] issue_id [issueId] section_id [sectionId]
{$scriptName} {$pluginName} import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] [user_name] issue_id [issueId] section_name [name]
{$scriptName} {$pluginName} import [xmlFileName] [journal_path] issue_id [issueId] section_abbrev [abbrev]
导出数据
导出刊期
导出栏目
导出文章
选择刊期
选择文章
导入文章
您正在导入的文件包含多篇文章。您必须选择一个指定的刊期和栏目。如果这些文章不属于一个刊期或者栏目，您应该把这个文件里的文章按照刊期与栏目分到不同的xml文件里。
导入数据
本插件提供基于native.dtd验证的数据导入功能。支持的跟节点是 <article>, <articles>, <issue>, 和 <issues>.
导入错误
在导入过程中发生多处错误。请检查导入文件的格式是否符合规格。导入错误的具体细节如下。
错误:
上传失败，请确认服务器是否支持上传或者您提供的文件大小超出服务器的限制.
指定用户, "{$userName}", 不存在.
指定期刊路径, "{$journalPath}", 不存在.
不能写入文件 "{$fileName}".
没有匹配的栏目"{$sectionIdentifier}".
没有匹配的刊期ID "{$issueId}".
没有匹配的文章ID"{$articleId}".
本插件不支持所提供的根节点 "{$rootName}".请确认文件的格式然后在尝试.
刊期的标题丢失
丢失的刊期标题
对于"{$issueTitle}"的"issue"标签的属性"identification"，未知的类型 "{$identificationType}"被指定.
指定的"{$value}"为非法的布尔值.请用"true" o或者"false".
指定的"{$value}"为非法日期.
数据使用了一种未知编码类型被嵌入："{$type}".
不能保存一个"{$originalName}"的本地副本.
为刊期"{$issueTitle}"指定了一个无效的URL： "{$url}" 。WEB提交导入方式只支持 http, https, ftp, 或者ftps方法.
指定的 "{$suppFileType}" 是未知的附件类型.
指定的URL"{$url}"不能被复制到本地文件。
为导入刊期指定的公共ID已经被其他刊期"{$otherIssueTitle}"使用.
A section title was missing for the issue "{$issueTitle}". Please ensure that the XML document conforms to the appropriate DTD.
The "{$sectionTitle}" section of the "{$issueTitle}" issue matched an existing journal section, but the specified abbreviation ("{$sectionAbbrev}") matched a different section.

An article title was missing for the issue "{$issueTitle}" in the section "{$sectionTitle}". Please ensure that the XML document conforms to the appropriate DTD, and that a title has been supplied for the journal's locale.
An article title ("{$articleTitle}") was provided for the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article abstract was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
The article "{$articleTitle}" in the section "{$sectionTitle}" of the issue "{$issueTitle}" was missing a galley label.
The article "{$articleTitle}" in the section "{$sectionTitle}" of the issue "{$issueTitle}" was missing a supplemental file.
The article "{$articleTitle}" in the section "{$sectionTitle}" of the issue "{$issueTitle}" was missing a galley file.
An issue title ("{$issueTitle}") was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A description of the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A cover of the the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A section title ("{$sectionTitle}") was provided in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A section abbreviation ("{$sectionAbbrev}") was provided in the issue ("{$issueTitle}") in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A section identifying type ("{$sectionIdentifyType}") was provided in the issue ("{$issueTitle}") in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A section policy ("{$sectionPolicy}") was provided in the issue ("{$issueTitle}") in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
The section title "{$section1Title}" and the section title "{$section2Title}" in the "{$issueTitle}" issue matched the different existing journal sections.

The section title "{$sectionTitle}" in the "{$issueTitle}" issue matched an existing journal section, but another title of this section doesn't match with another title of the existing journal section.
The section abbreviation "{$section1Abbrev}" and the section abbreviation "{$section2Abbrev}" of the "{$issueTitle}" issue matched the different existing journal sections.

The section abbreviation "{$sectionAbbrev}" in the "{$issueTitle}" issue matched an existing journal section, but another abbreviation of this section doesn't match with another abbreviation of the existing journal section.
An article discipline was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article type was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article subject was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article subject classification was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article geographical coverage was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article geographical coverage was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article sample coverage was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An article sponsor was provided for the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.

An author competing interest was provided for the author "{$authorFullName}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
An author biography was provided for the author "{$authorFullName}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A galley of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A supplementary file title ("{$suppFileTitle}") of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A creator of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A subject of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A custom type of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A description of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A publisher of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A sponsor of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
A source of the supplementary file "{$suppFileTitle}" of the article "{$articleTitle}" in the issue "{$issueTitle}" was provided in a locale ("{$locale}") that this journal does not support.
导入成功
导入已经成功，导入项目列表如下.
导入文件中包含一个无效的数据集 {$pubIdType}: '{$pubId}'.
为读者提供该期刊不支持的的作者单位选项 该文章的"{$作者全名}"期目中的 "{$文章标题}" 位置中的{$期目标题}"("{$locale}") 。
您导入的文件包含已在数据库中的其他项目中存有的{$pubIdType} '{$pubId}' 数据集。请确保您不再导入ID已经在数据库中存在的项目。
您导入的文件包含ID插件无法处理的含有 '{$pubIdType}'ID类型的数据集。请在试图导入该数据集前，安装和/或激活相应的ID插件。
补充文件"{$suppFileTitle}"的公共ID已被同一篇文章的补充文件"{$otherSuppFileTitle}". 使用。
导出文章"{$articleTitle}" 的公共ID已被另一篇文章"{$otherArticleTitle}"使用
导入样稿 "{$publicId}" 的公共ID已经被同一篇文章的其他样稿"{$articleTitle}"所使用。
